resources.string: PlanningAlerts AU is based on the good work at planningalerts.org.au

string.name: About
string.p: PlanningAlertsAU is an open source Android App built on top of the very cool work being done by the folks over at OpenAustralia.
It is a work in progress, so please feel free to log any bugs here
